args:
Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no".
Can you find all the Oscar statues? Try our image search.
We all know winning an Oscar is hard, but finding them on a disorganized and messy movie set might be harder. With the help of illustrator Max Guther, we hid 23 Oscar statues, one per category, and 17 Easter eggs for nominated films. Can you find them all before the Academy Awards show on Sunday? Test your skills below. (Psst, you can zoom in for a better view.)
About this story
Editing by Betty Chavarria and Junne Joaquin Alcantara. Copy editing by Emily Morman.
